00016 /**
00017  * @brief Returns a value from \c $GLOBALS.
00018  * @param string $key The key for array \c $GLOBALS.
00019  * @return mixed The value from \c $GLOBALS or FALSE if not found.
00020  */
00021 function globals($key) {
00022     $key = (string) $key;
00023     if (isset($GLOBALS) && array_key_exists($key, $GLOBALS)) {
00024         return $GLOBALS[$key];
00025     } else {
00026         return false;
00027     }
00028 }
00029

00058 /**
00059  * @brief Returns a value from \c $_POST.
00060  * @param string $key The key for array \c $_POST.
00061  * @return mixed The value from \c $_POST or FALSE if not found.
00062  */
00063 function _post($key) {
00064     $key = (string) $key;
00065     
00066     // remove [] from key
00067     if (substr($key, -2) == '[]') {
00068         $key = substr($key, 0, strlen($key) - 2);
00069     }
00070     
00071     $depth = explode('[', $key);
00072     // remove trailing bracket
00073     array_trim($depth, ']');
00074     
00075     // handle arrays
00076     if (isset($_POST)) {
00077         $postVar = $_POST;
00078         foreach ($depth as $key => $value) {
00079             if (array_key_exists($value, $postVar)) {
00080                 $postVar = $postVar[$value];
00081             } else {
00082                 return false;
00083             }
00084         }
00085         return $postVar;
00086     } else {
00087         return false;
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00091
